languages.text: {n}Палец Кибеллы скользит по бледной коже — одно долгое и плавное движение от изгиба бедра к острой ключице, через узор священных стигматов и боевых шрамов.{/n} "Мы познали друг друга, {name}. Через откровение тела наша духовная связь сплелась крепче. Ты чувствуешь это?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Палец Кибеллы скользит по ее бледной коже — одно долгое и плавное движение от изгиба бедра к острой ключице, через узор священных стигматов и боевых шрамов.{/n} "Мы познали друг друга, {name}. Через откровение тела наша духовная связь сплелась крепче. Ты чувствуешь это?"

languages.text: {n}Kibellah draws a finger across her pale skin, tracing a long, fluid line from the curve of her hip to the sharp ridge of her clavicle, through the pattern of ritual wounds and battle scars.{/n} "We have gained knowledge of one another, {name}. Through the revelation of the flesh, we have spun a stronger spiritual bond between us. Do you feel it?"
languages.original_text: {n}Палец Кибеллы скользит по бледной коже — одно долгое и плавное движение от изгиба бедра к острой ключице, через узор священных стигматов и боевых шрамов.{/n} "Мы познали друг друга, {name}. Через откровение тела наша духовная связь сплелась крепче. Ты чувствуешь это?"

Through the revelation of the flesh, we have spun a stronger spiritual bond between us. Do you feel it?"

Through the revelation of the flesh, we have spun a stronger spiritual bond between us. Do you feel it?"

{n}Kibellah draws a finger across her pale skin, tracing a long, fluid line from the curve of her hip to the sharp ridge of her clavicle, through the pattern of ritual wounds and battle scars.{/n} "We have gained knowledge of one another, {name}. Through the revelation of the flesh, we have spun a stronger spiritual bond between us. Do you feel it?"

languages.text: {n}Kibellah desliza un dedo por su pálida piel, trazando una línea prolongada e ininterrumpida desde la curva de su cadera hasta el prominente hueso de su clavícula, recorriendo el entramado de escarificaciones rituales y cicatrices de combate que cubren su cuerpo.{/n} «Hemos aprendido mucho la una {mf|del otro|de la otra}, {name}. Mediante las revelaciones de la carne hemos tejido un vínculo espiritual más intenso entre nosotros. ¿Puede sentirlo?».
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah draws a finger across her pale skin, tracing a long, fluid line from the curve of her hip to the sharp ridge of her clavicle, through the pattern of ritual wounds and battle scars.{/n} "We have gained knowledge of one another, {name}. Through the revelation of the flesh, we have spun a stronger spiritual bond between us. Do you feel it?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah desliza un dedo por su pálida piel, trazando una línea prolongada e ininterrumpida desde la curva de su cadera hasta el prominente hueso de su clavícula, recorriendo el entramado de escarificaciones rituales y cicatrices de combate que cubren su cuerpo.{/n} «Hemos aprendido mucho la una {mf|del otro|de la otra}, {name}. Mediante las revelaciones de la carne hemos tejido un vínculo espiritual más intenso entre nosotros. ¿Puede sentirlo?».

languages.text: {n}キベラは青白い肌を指でなぞり、腰のカーブから鎖骨の鋭い隆起まで、儀式の傷と戦いの傷跡の模様をなぞるように長く流れるような線を描いた。{/n}「私たちは互いの知識を得ました。{name}肉体の啓示を通してより強い精神的な絆を紡いだ。あなたもそう感じますか？」
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah draws a finger across her pale skin, tracing a long, fluid line from the curve of her hip to the sharp ridge of her clavicle, through the pattern of ritual wounds and battle scars.{/n} "We have gained knowledge of one another, {name}. Through the revelation of the flesh, we have spun a stronger spiritual bond between us. Do you feel it?"

traits.locale_text: {n}キベラは青白い肌を指でなぞり、腰のカーブから鎖骨の鋭い隆起まで、儀式の傷と戦いの傷跡の模様をなぞるように長く流れるような線を描いた。{/n}「私たちは互いの知識を得ました。{name}肉体の啓示を通してより強い精神的な絆を紡いだ。あなたもそう感じますか？」

languages.text: {n}绮贝菈伸出一根手指，划过她苍白的皮肤。她的手指沿着仪式的伤痕与战斗留下的伤疤，从臀部的曲线到锁骨的尖脊，划出了一条长长的、流畅的线条。{/n}“我们已经熟识彼此了，{name}。通过肉体的启示，我们之间建立了更加牢固的精神纽带，你感觉到了吗？”
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah draws a finger across her pale skin, tracing a long, fluid line from the curve of her hip to the sharp ridge of her clavicle, through the pattern of ritual wounds and battle scars.{/n} "We have gained knowledge of one another, {name}. Through the revelation of the flesh, we have spun a stronger spiritual bond between us. Do you feel it?"

traits.locale_text: {n}绮贝菈伸出一根手指，划过她苍白的皮肤。她的手指沿着仪式的伤痕与战斗留下的伤疤，从臀部的曲线到锁骨的尖脊，划出了一条长长的、流畅的线条。{/n}“我们已经熟识彼此了，{name}。通过肉体的启示，我们之间建立了更加牢固的精神纽带，你感觉到了吗？”

languages.text: {n}Kibellah fährt sich mit einem Finger über ihre blasse Haut und zieht durch das Muster aus rituellen Wunden und Kampfnarben eine Linie von ihrer Hüfte bis zum Schlüsselbein.{/n} "Wir haben Wissen übereinander erlangt, {name}. Durch die Offenbarung des Fleisches haben wir ein stärkeres spirituelles Band zwischen uns gesponnen. Spürt Ihr es?"
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah draws a finger across her pale skin, tracing a long, fluid line from the curve of her hip to the sharp ridge of her clavicle, through the pattern of ritual wounds and battle scars.{/n} "We have gained knowledge of one another, {name}. Through the revelation of the flesh, we have spun a stronger spiritual bond between us. Do you feel it?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah fährt sich mit einem Finger über ihre blasse Haut und zieht durch das Muster aus rituellen Wunden und Kampfnarben eine Linie von ihrer Hüfte bis zum Schlüsselbein.{/n} "Wir haben Wissen übereinander erlangt, {name}. Durch die Offenbarung des Fleisches haben wir ein stärkeres spirituelles Band zwischen uns gesponnen. Spürt Ihr es?"

languages.text: {n}Kibellah passe un doigt sur sa peau pâle, traçant une longue ligne fluide allant de la courbe de ses hanches à la crête saillante de sa clavicule, à travers le lacis de plaies rituelles et de cicatrices attestant de ses nombreux combats.{/n} « Nous avons appris à mieux nous connaître, {name}. À travers la révélation de la chair, nous avons renforcé le lien spirituel qui nous unissait. Le sentez-vous ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah draws a finger across her pale skin, tracing a long, fluid line from the curve of her hip to the sharp ridge of her clavicle, through the pattern of ritual wounds and battle scars.{/n} "We have gained knowledge of one another, {name}. Through the revelation of the flesh, we have spun a stronger spiritual bond between us. Do you feel it?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah passe un doigt sur sa peau pâle, traçant une longue ligne fluide allant de la courbe de ses hanches à la crête saillante de sa clavicule, à travers le lacis de plaies rituelles et de cicatrices attestant de ses nombreux combats.{/n} « Nous avons appris à mieux nous connaître, {name}. À travers la révélation de la chair, nous avons renforcé le lien spirituel qui nous unissait. Le sentez-vous ? »

languages.text: {n}Kibellah, parmağını soluk cildinde gezdiriyor. Sıyrıklardan oluşma ayin motifleri ve savaşlardan kalma yara izleri üzerinde gezdirdiği parmağıyla kalçalarının kıvrımlarından başlayıp köprücük kemiğinin sert çıkıntısına dek uzun, dalgalı bir hat çiziyor.{/n} "Birbirimizi artık iyi tanıyoruz {name}. Etimizi keşfederek çok daha güçlü bir ruhsal bağ ördük. Sen de hissediyor musun?"
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah draws a finger across her pale skin, tracing a long, fluid line from the curve of her hip to the sharp ridge of her clavicle, through the pattern of ritual wounds and battle scars.{/n} "We have gained knowledge of one another, {name}. Through the revelation of the flesh, we have spun a stronger spiritual bond between us. Do you feel it?"
